values: ^^ i was randomly looking for pink icons to go into my Lj background and they had a picture of ted bear in there, i was like what?! this is so going in my journal, she looks awesome in this picture!! :o)

well yesterday i woke up, went to the barn and i honestly dont know what else. i guess just hung out here with ted bear. then we went to denys for lunch where i saw smokey, who i havent seen in ages, and she told me shes having a baby. i enjoyed it lol. then i went home for like ten minutes then headed off to that dance stuff for loris 15. when i came home i went back to the barn and fed then mikeys friend came and got me and i went over to williams with all them and watched them play poker and drink. it was tight i guess. mikey managed to piss me off on the one night this month that i get to see him. he sat there and rambled on about justin and how i fucked up with that. then he got fustrated cause i wouldnt give him a kissthe remainder of the night but that was his fault. then i came home and went to bed, well layed in it atleast. i kind of wanted my boyfriend to call but he was too shit faced to remember me, or he fell asleep lol. my best friend, garrett, ended up calling and we talked for a while. he promised me wed do something today but i doubt we will. and he said we can drink this weekend :o)  im excited. i miss garrett so much, i havent seen him since school got out. but yeah then i fell asleep and just woke up. my sister went to feed for me cause its late and i just dont feel like getting up to feed today. but now im going to go eat breakfast or go back to bed. xoxo

<3

well yesterday i woke up, went to the barn and i honestly dont know what else. i guess just hung out here with ted bear. then we went to denys for lunch where i saw smokey, who i havent seen in ages, and she told me shes having a baby. i enjoyed it lol. then i went home for like ten minutes then headed off to that dance stuff for loris 15. when i came home i went back to the barn and fed then mikeys friend came and got me and i went over to williams with all them and watched them play poker and drink. it was tight i guess. mikey managed to piss me off on the one night this month that i got to see him. he sat there and rambled on about justin and how i fucked up with that. then he got frustrated cause i wouldnt give him a kiss the remainder of the night but that was his fault. then i came home and went to bed, well laid in it at least. i kind of wanted my boyfriend to call but he was too shit faced to remember me, or he fell asleep lol. my best friend, garrett, ended up calling and we talked for a while. he promised me wed do something today but i doubt we will. and he said we can drink this weekend :o)  im excited. i miss garrett so much, i havent seen him since school got out. but yeah then i fell asleep and just woke up. my sister went to feed for me cause its late and i just dont feel like getting up to feed today. but now im going to go eat breakfast or go back to bed. xoxo

<3

well yesterday i went to the orthodontist, he said do 6 more turns then stop and my gap will close up on its own then ill get my braces when my teeth stop shifting. after that i came home and got dressed or what ever so my sister and i could go get feed from rosenburg for pedro and tank. after we got that we stopped at a bunch of stores and she got the hat rack she was looking for and i got some stuff. then we went to some other places and target and i got a new skirt  :o)  then i came home, took a quick shower, got dressed in a rush and headed to the kempner graduation with shannon sheri and sheri's mom. i havent gone anywhere with the szosteks in so long. im glad matt graduated. i didnt think it would happen. im proud of him lol. the one person im going to miss the most though is Joel. even if i didnt talk to him about everything, he was there for me to if i needed it and i really appreciate it. and hes going to come see me no matter what next year lol i wont have him to talk to every day before 7th period. but its ok ill still see him some hopefully. but yeah now im getting ready for another graduation lol clemets. so im going to go get dressed in my SKIRT and head to the barn then erins then wait for patrick to come get us so we can watch him graduate :o)  im excited lol but yeah im going now. xoxo

<3

does a lamb really need f-ing wormer every 21 days?! thats rediculous. but yeah i just got back from picking that stuff up with carri, now im getting dressed then going out for the night. i dont know where or to do what but yeah lol thats what im doing. yesterday i went and got lunch then hung out at starbucks with kit nad her friends. then i came home and went running. after that i called jello and we went to the store then to the barn.  at the barn i put some more sand in my pen and gave pedro a bath, a well needed one that is. then i came hoem talked to mikey and went to bed.

the day before that i went to the barn with erica right after school. we went to burger king and got lunch. then we went back to tyhe barn cleaned pens weighned bathed and all that stuff. and i moved my fan to the other side of my pen and did some other stuff. i was up there from the time we got out of school to the time to feed (6:00)

but yeah now im going to go shower and change to go out. talk to yall later. xoxo

<3 Lo

so yeah, this morning i went to school, then daniel took bee and i over to bee's house. then kristen and gar bear came over and we ordered panda garden which was good. then we hung out there for a while. around 5:00 my mom called so i had to walk home. then i called pat-rick and he came and got me and we went to the barn then drove around needlessly for hours looking for yellow cars. our scores are currently 11 to 5 i believe. the papers in his truck so i dont know. while looking for yellow cars we managed to go dove hunting, although we only killed one, and it was totally by accident. it didnt fly away in time. it got what was coming to him lol, then we went to erins and watched her fall off a truck and get all cut up :o(  poor erin, so we went and bought her ciggarettes and hung out there a bit. then i wanted to go home so pat-rick took me home. then i talked to him on the phone for a bit and he asked me to go to his graduation so i get to do that on saturday, which is going to be exciting :o) then i took a shower, blow dried my hair, talked to mikey and now im getting ready for bed. yeah so now im headed to bed until mikey calls me back and then ill talk to him and actually go to bed. adios.

<3

am i still mad? is that honestly all you have to fucking say? i went into 7th period today practically in tears. you screwed me the fuck over and dont even care. yes im still mad. ask me in a month and youll still have the same answer. i dont even want to think about you. i hate you. how can you set me up, promise me youll never do that to me then that very next day talk shit about me to your friends that already dont like me? you were so fucking worried about me hurting you all along and it was because you didnt want me to do to you what you were doing to me. you lied. you were wrong to do what you did and you know it, yet you dont even care, and all you have to say for yourself is " still mad?" obviously im still mad. you have no idea what was going on in my head saturday night, not one clue, yet you act like i purposely ruined the night, like i wanted to have a terrible time. then you went on to lie to all your little friends about it. that was wrong, beyond wrong. i trusted you. i believed you. and all that for what? just to get torn apart? thats not what i wanted, not what i expected or even saw coming. thats far from what i thought would happen. i gave up some one, some one that honestly cared and meant the things he said. some one who didnt plan on screwing me over. some one who told me they loved me and actually cared. some one who was there when i was upset and having a bad night. i gave that some one all up for you. that was one of the biggest mistakes ive made. i regret it more than anything. i asked you what you were doing last night and you said " laying in bed wishing you were here "  that was about an hour after you sat around talking shit about me. do you not feel guilty about that at all? i dont even understand anymore. all i know is that i want you to stay away from me. dont call me. dont text me. nothing. forget about me. it cant be hard.

<3

There's a boat, I could sail away
There's the sky, I could catch a plane
There's a train, there's the tracks
I could leave and I could choose to not come back
Oh, never come back

There you are, giving up the fight
Here I am begging you to try
Talk to me, let me in
But you just put your wall back up again
Oh, when's it gonna end

How far do I have to go to make you understand
I wanna make this work so much it hurts, but I just can't
Keep on giving, go on living with the way things are
So I'm gonna walk away
And it's up to you to say how far

There's a chance I could change my mind
But I won't, not till you decide
What you want, what you need
Do you even care if I stay or leave
Oh, what's it gonna be

How far do I have to go to make you understand
I wanna make this work so much it hurts, but I just can't
Keep on giving, go on living with the way things are
So I'm gonna walk away
And it's up to you to say how far

Out of this chair, or just across the room
Halfway down the block or halfway to the moon

How far do I have to go to make you understand
I wanna make this work so much it hurts, but I just can't
Keep on giving, go on living with the way things are
So I'm gonna walk away
And it's up to you to say
Yeah I'm gonna walk away
And it's up to you to say how far

alright so i got tired of the other journal, now im going to give this one a try.

umm yeah, friday i hung out with patrick, we went to the barn to feed, spencers house, needvile (for no reason at all) and rosenburg (once again for no reason at all) then i came home cause i had to be here by 11 seeing as my mom thought i was lieing about who i was with, she thought i was with mikey. but yeah i wasnt with mikey cause im not even going out with him anymore. she seems to think im lieing about that one too but im not.

saturday i went to the barn and fed, then i sat around the house most of the day. then my sister and david took me to chick-fil-a for lunch before they went to Niko Niko's (a greek restraunt).  after a while justin got done working or what ever so i went back to the barn, fed again, then came home and played with my cousin and brothers ducks. then justin came and got me and we drove around a bit, then we went to Jillians in the mall. i was in a not so good mood the whole time though, and that not so good mood got him mad at me cause i said something i shouldnt have said.

now its sunday and i just got home from the barn. i pissed Justin off quite a bit, not intentionally though. i mean if you had heard the things hes done it would make you worry a bit also. i understand that there is a limit to how much i worry about it, but every time i talk to some one about him they tell me hes going to screw me over no matter how much i look out for it. so this morning i was texting him and i asked him about it once again and then he blew up on me. i wont get into what he said but yeah. i really do understand what he meant though, im sure if he asked me the same question over and over id get mad. i dont think id say what he said but i know id get frustrated. i guess the fact that he treats me so much different than mikey and other people i wont get into is what makes me worry so much. i mean i feel like i have more too lose, liek i actually have to hold on and work for this one. mikey was so determined to make things work that he couldnt get mad at me. even when i told him about justin and about that night at erins and everything, he didnt get mad or care at all. i dont know if that meant that he never cared in the first place or if it meant he didnt want to loose what he had so he kept the anger in.i dont care about that anymore though. its just that, i dont know, its different. i havent figured out why i wrap myself up into little things that are going to be gone in no time at all.

but on a lighter note, schools almost out, meaning i will soon be spending my days at my aunt and uncles house watching my cousin from 7:30 - 5:00 every week day, well starting next monday. its not going to be too bad though cause brandon lives behind her and he has a little sister thats like best friends with elisa (my cousin) so ill deffinately be spending my time over there. oh, and gar bear is moving soon. hes going to live a 5 minute walk away from me, which is pretty exciting seeing as hes my best friend. well not so much anymore but we can fix that. i havent hung out with him in so long. i miss him. once we get a week or two into summer im starting my room. im painting it, doing a new border, new bed frame and everything else. my dad told me i should be a deffense attorney, it got me thinking. right now im set on being an interior designer, but he doesnt have a bad idea. i dont know what i want to do yet.

im now going to go clean a bit and get ready for the day. i think jello and i are going to hang out, im not quite sure though. i guess it just depends on when she calls and what im doing at the time.

<3 Lo
